Description: Pottery: coarse ware one-handled bottle (lagena/lekythos); red-orange micaceous clay with a red-brown semi-matt slip; white painted decoration of diagonal rays on shoulder, between two pairs of deep grooves; two white wavy bands like the ends of a fillet falling from base of handle; rim broken; two-thirds restored.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
